A section of Blue Line has merged into the [[Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport Access MRT System]] and is under construction, while the surplus is still in planning phase. == Lines and stations == {|class="wikitable" ! colspan=3 |Line!!colspan=2|Termini!!Length (km)!!Total
